mapper.sql: ID_ as id, PATHPRI as pathPri, MDIRECTION as mdirection, CORHR1 as corhr1, CORHR2 as corhr2, CORHR3 as corhr3, CORHR4 as corhr4, CORHR5 as corhr4, CORHR6 as corhr6, CORHR7 as corhr7, CORHR8 as corhr8, CORHR9 as corhr9, CORHR10 as corhr10, SORT_ as sort, PATH_UID_ as pathUid, PRICE_RATIOA as priceRatioA,PRICE_RATIOB as priceRatioB,TRANS_LOSS as transLoss,DATA_ as data
mapper.insert: insert into CBPM_CORRIDOR_PATH (ID_, PATHPRI, MDIRECTION, CORHR1, CORHR2, CORHR3, CORHR4, CORHR5, CORHR6,CORHR7, CORHR8, CORHR9,CORHR10, SORT_, PATH_UID_,PRICE_RATIOA,PRICE_RATIOB,TRANS_LOSS,DATA_) values (#{id},#{pathPri},#{mdirection},#{corhr1},#{corhr2},#{corhr3},#{corhr4},#{corhr5}, #{corhr6},#{corhr7},#{corhr8},#{corhr9},#{corhr10},#{sort},#{pathUid},#{priceRatioA},#{priceRatioB},#{transLoss},#{data})
